name: Stick Ball 3D
description:
Roll the ball and stick the blocks, "Stick Ball 3D!"

Game Features:

● EASY TO PLAY
Playable with one-hand!
Swipe the screen to roll the ball and stick the blocks!

● EASY STAGES
No need to be a rocket scientist to clear the stages!
Just think outside the box!

● PLAY AT YOUR FREE TIME
All stages can be cleared in less than a minute!

● FREE TO PLAY
Completely free!
More stages to come!
